Kevin Munc

Method of the Month

21 Aug 2018

Last night I was back at our local Ruby users group for the first time in a long time. I was thrilled to see that a lightning talk “series” I used to give has been resurrected!

I’ve given a dozen or so Method of the Month presentations for Ruby (and JavaScript) in the past, and I’ve been thinking of bringing them back for CocoaHeads, so this is great inspiration to do it.

Oh, damn! I just remembered I still have the domain, though I’ve done nothing with it yet. 🤦🏻‍♂️
